channel.title: fitgreenmind TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from fitgreenmind

item.title: DON’T KISS ME PASTA 🍝 5 onions, 1 head of garlic… I like! 🥰 RECIPE (3 servings, 1h prep time): -5 onions -1 head of garlic -1 Tsp thyme -salt to taste -olive oil -optional: 50ml white wine Combine in a baking tray. Bake at 180C/360F for 50min. -200g pas
